Performance Upgrades

Upgrade your Ride

If you are like us, it's hard to stop modifying and looking for areas that can be improved. It's been a long time since your car was produced, and you might be surprised to find out what's available for your vehicle to improve overall performance.

EFI Conversions

EFI isnâ€™t a magic bullet that solves poor running conditions - but it can make your car easier to start both when cold and hot and increase overall reliability in most driving conditions.

Transform your classic vehicle into a high-performance powerhouse by opting for an engine swap. Brace yourself for an surge in horsepower that will redefine your driving experience like never before

click for more

Wiring and Electrical

Your electrical system is one of the most important yet overlooked parts of your vehicle. We'll diagnose your car's entire system to make it work â€” and safe.

click for more

Brake Upgrades

Going fast rocks, but stopping is just as important. We'll make sure to give your ride updated, dependable brakes so you can enjoy your cruise while being safe.

click for more

Suspension Upgrades

If you're looking to improve the handling, ride quality, and performance of your classic car, upgrading the suspension is a great way to do it.

click for more

Exhaust

The right pipes can make you engine purr or make it sound like a beast. We'll design the best system for your vehicle using the highest quality parts and custom fabrication.

click for more

When hot summer day keeps you off the streets, and a new bolt-in or updated factory-correct climate control system may get you back behind the wheel.

Need some work done on your ride?

Give us a bit to respond with a detailed estimate. We need time to do a through review to research and write your estimate.

1 Get a Quote

Tells us what's wrong with your car or work you want done. We'll shoot back a detailed estimate that includes diagnosis, parts, and labor.

2 Approve Repairs

Once you approve the estimate, we'll book an appoitment to drop off your car and our team will get to work.

3 Time is Money

Only pay for time our team is working on your car. We use strict time tracking to ensure you won't pay extra.

4 Hit the Road

Our certified team will fix your car and get you back on the road.

To ensure a prompt response, please enter your valid phone number and email

Please be patient: It can take a day or 2 for smaller jobs and a few days for more complex requests.

Let's Go >
